name: Introduction to C Programming
desc: This course provides a comprehensive introduction to the fundamentals of C programming, covering topics like variables, loops, functions, and pointers. Ideal for beginners looking to kickstart their programming journey.

name: Introduction to Algorithms
desc: Explore the world of algorithms and data structures with this course. Learn key algorithmic concepts and techniques used in computer science and problem-solving.

name: Introduction to C++
desc: Get started with C++ programming, a powerful and versatile language. Master the syntax and object-oriented programming principles in this introductory course.

name: Basic Data Structure
desc: Build a strong foundation in data structures such as arrays, linked lists, and trees. Understand their importance in efficient algorithm design.

name: Introduction OOP Python
desc: Learn object-oriented programming (OOP) with Python. Discover the principles of encapsulation, inheritance, and polymorphism through hands-on coding exercises.

name: Software Engineering
desc: Delve into the world of software engineering and best practices. Cover topics like requirements analysis, design patterns, and project management.

name: AWS & Cloud Computing
desc: Explore Amazon Web Services (AWS) and cloud computing. Learn how to deploy, manage, and scale applications in the cloud environment.

name: Database (MySQL)
desc: Dive into the world of relational databases with MySQL. Understand data modeling, querying, and database administration.

name: Problem Solving
desc: Enhance your problem-solving skills with this course. Practice solving algorithmic challenges and real-world problems efficiently.
